[00:00.00]Ridin' Roads - Dustin Lynch
[00:01.32]Composed by：Ashley Gorley/Dustin Lynch/Zach Crowell
[00:02.64]Ridin' roads
[00:09.47]Ridin' roads
[00:17.07]Uh yeah
[00:18.93]This town ain't got no nightclub nightclub
[00:21.43]We don't need the neon lights
[00:24.82]Girl I got that '87 gassed up
[00:27.68]30 early out there in your drive
[00:30.96]Got you a bullet and koozie keep it ice cold
[00:34.40]You take a sip 'fore we get gone
[00:37.90]Lookin' at you with your hand out the window
[00:41.16]I'm turnin' right while you're turnin' me on yeah
[00:44.81]Ridin' roads that don't nobody go down
[00:48.05]A little trip through the country side
[00:51.36]These 38s makin' the world go 'round
[00:54.74]I hit a curb just to make you slide
[00:58.44]Only light is the flashing yellow
[01:01.51]Only thing that I want is your kiss
[01:04.91]I'm lovin' nothin' to do with you baby
[01:08.04]Just ridin' roads on a night like this
[01:15.13]Ridin' roads
[01:19.02]Out there where the moon hits the water
[01:22.28]Out there where your lips hit mine
[01:25.60]I don't know where we are
[01:27.03]'Cause somebody stole the street signs
[01:29.02]I'ma take my sweet time yeah
[01:32.45]'Cause I could go on forever
[01:35.78]With you there ridin' shotgun yeah
[01:38.92]All our friends are probably makin' plans baby
[01:42.19]Yeah but we already got one
[01:45.50]We'll be ridin' roads that don't nobody go down
[01:48.90]A little trip through the country side
[01:52.26]These 38s makin' the world go 'round
[01:55.63]I hit a curb just to make you slide
[01:59.07]Only light is the flashing yellow
[02:02.31]Only thing that I want is your kiss
[02:05.74]I'm lovin' nothin' to do with you baby
[02:08.69]Just ridin' roads on a night like this
[02:14.95]Just ridin' roads on a night like this
[02:24.71]Ridin' roads
[02:26.13]I got one hand on the wheel
[02:28.54]And I got the other tryna 'cross the line line line
[02:32.76]Yeah the way you make feel
[02:35.17]I wanna keep it rollin' 'til the sun rise rise rise
[02:39.65]Ridin' roads that don't nobody go down
[02:42.93]A little trip through the country side
[02:46.18]These 38s makin' the world go 'round
[02:49.70]I hit a curb just to make you slide
[02:53.13]Only light is the flashing yellow
[02:56.45]Only thing that I want is your kiss
[02:59.86]I'm lovin' nothin' to do with you baby
[03:02.75]Just ridin' roads on a night like this
[03:09.37]Just ridin' roads on a night like this
[03:15.40]Ridin' roads

[ti:Ridin' Roads]
[ar:Dustin Lynch]
[al:Ridin' Roads]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.32]//
[00:02.64]在路上行驶
[00:09.47]在路上行驶
[00:17.07]//
[00:18.93]这个小镇没有夜店
[00:21.43]我们不需要霓虹灯
[00:24.82]姑娘 我把那辆八七年的车加满油了
[00:27.68]提前半小时到你家门口
[00:30.96]我给你带了一点酒 还是冰镇的呢
[00:34.40]你先喝一口 咱们就出发
[00:37.90]看着你把手伸出窗外
[00:41.16]我向右转弯 被你深深迷醉
[00:44.81]开车行驶在空旷无人的道路上
[00:48.05]穿过美丽的乡村
[00:51.36]这些事物对这个世界多么重要
[00:54.74]我故意让车颠簸一下 让你靠近我
[00:58.44]唯一的光亮是我们黄色的车灯
[01:01.51]我唯一想要的是你的吻
[01:04.91]我喜欢和你在一起 什么事都不做
[01:08.04]就这样在夜里行驶在路上
[01:15.13]在路上行驶
[01:19.02]月亮倒映在水中
[01:22.28]你我双唇相接
[01:25.60]我不知道我们在哪里
[01:27.03]因为有人把路标偷走了
[01:29.02]我要享受这美好时光
[01:32.45]因为我可以永远这样开下去
[01:35.78]只要有你坐在副驾驶上就行了
[01:38.92]我们的朋友可能都在计划着什么
[01:42.19]但我们已经有了计划
[01:45.50]我们会开车行驶在空旷无人的道路上
[01:48.90]穿过美丽的乡村
[01:52.26]这些事物对这个世界多么重要

[02:28.54]另一只手想要握住你
[02:32.76]你给我一种感觉
[02:35.17]让我想要一直这样开下去 直到太阳升起
[02:39.65]开车行驶在空旷无人的道路上
[02:42.93]穿过美丽的乡村
